wikipedia_page.main: George William Crick (1 December 1888 – 5 April 1982) was an English footballer who played in various defensive positions, for Southampton in the Southern League in 1915.

response: Hall originally played in the reserves before making his solitary first-team appearance as a replacement for Arthur Dominy at inside-right for the Southern League match at Bristol Rovers on 17 March 1915, with his former Market Harborough colleague George Crick at centre-half.
